critiques.subject: Nighttime city skyline with reflections in water
improvements: [MODERATE] Apply masked noise reduction to the sky
[SUBTLE] Increase clarity/structure specifically on the buildings
preserve: The vertical elongation of the light reflections in the water
critiques.notes: A striking monochromatic cityscape with excellent composition. The primary opportunity for improvement lies in cleaning up the sky artifacts to achieve a 'fine art' look while maintaining the dramatic lighting.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply masked noise reduction to the sky
improvements_detailed.reason: To smooth out visible grain and compression artifacts in the clouds without softening the architectural details.

improvements_detailed.action: Increase clarity/structure specifically on the buildings
improvements_detailed.reason: To sharpen the cityscape and make the architecture pop against the softer sky.
To recover detail in the blown-out window clusters and bright water reflections.
To draw the viewer's eye toward the center of the skyline and contain the composition.

context.subject: Nighttime city skyline with reflections in water
preserve: The vertical elongation of the light reflections in the water

critiques.subject: Black-and-white city skyline at night with reflections on the water
improvements: [MODERATE] Reduce highlights/whites (Highlights -30 to -50, Whites -10 to -25) and, if needed, use a luminance range mask to selectively pull down the brightest building/windows and shoreline lights to recover detail and reduce glare
[MODERATE] Apply targeted noise reduction (Luminance NR ~20–35, Color NR ~20) primarily to the sky and water using masking; avoid over-smoothing buildings
[SUBTLE] Increase midtone contrast and structure with a gentle S-curve plus Clarity/Texture (+10 to +20) on buildings only (mask by subject), keeping the sky softer
[SUBTLE] Crop slightly from the bottom (and optionally a touch from the top) to reduce the heavy dark water band and tighten emphasis on the skyline and primary reflections
[SUBTLE] Add a subtle post-crop vignette (-8 to -15) and/or a very soft linear gradient to darken the outer sky edges slightly
preserve: Black-and-white treatment and overall moody nighttime atmosphere
Natural look of the water reflections and the sense of haze/cloud texture in the sky
critiques.notes: Strong nighttime skyline with pleasing reflections and a cinematic B&W vibe. The main opportunities are controlling bright highlight hotspots, reducing noise in the sky/water, and adding selective midtone definition to the buildings without amplifying grain.

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce highlights/whites (Highlights -30 to -50, Whites -10 to -25) and, if needed, use a luminance range mask to selectively pull down the brightest building/windows and shoreline lights to recover detail and reduce glare
improvements_detailed.reason: Several light sources and reflections read as clipped or overly bright, which dominates the scene and hides detail in the skyline.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply targeted noise reduction (Luminance NR ~20–35, Color NR ~20) primarily to the sky and water using masking; avoid over-smoothing buildings
improvements_detailed.reason: The sky/water show visible grain/noise that reduces the clean, atmospheric look and can worsen if shadows are adjusted.

improvements_detailed.action: Increase midtone contrast and structure with a gentle S-curve plus Clarity/Texture (+10 to +20) on buildings only (mask by subject), keeping the sky softer
improvements_detailed.reason: The skyline appears slightly soft; controlled micro-contrast helps define edges and window patterns without making noise in the sky/water more apparent.

improvements_detailed.action: Crop slightly from the bottom (and optionally a touch from the top) to reduce the heavy dark water band and tighten emphasis on the skyline and primary reflections
improvements_detailed.reason: Composition can feel bottom-heavy; a tighter crop improves balance and directs attention to the city lights and their leading reflections.

improvements_detailed.action: Add a subtle post-crop vignette (-8 to -15) and/or a very soft linear gradient to darken the outer sky edges slightly
improvements_detailed.reason: Guides the eye toward the central cluster of buildings while maintaining the nocturnal mood.

context.subject: Black-and-white city skyline at night with reflections on the water
preserve: Black-and-white treatment and overall moody nighttime atmosphere
Natural look of the water reflections and the sense of haze/cloud texture in the sky
